transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, ab awaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Hmm. Aa rahi hai boliye.
Executive: Main hunara baat kar rahi hun. Abhi aap se baat kar rahe the to voice issue aa raha tha. Maine aapko dobara connect karaya hai. Main aapko ye keh rahi thi sir, dekho aapka jo issue aa raha hai usko apan theek kar sakte hain. Main ek kaam kar rahi hun, catalog jo hai na aapka aur aapke jo products hain, unme description mein cheeze theek se add hain nahi.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aur na hi description add hai. Aapne dekha hoga 41 mein se aapke [inaudible].
Customer: Humko wo baat nahi bolna mere ko madam. Usse humko koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Humko usse koi matlab nahi hai. Add hai chahe nahi hai usse hume koi matlab nahi hai. Aapka jo lead aa raha hai, mera baat pehle sun lijiye, aapka jo lead aa raha hai, koi service provider ko aapne kisi ko 20 phone de rakha hai. Wahi log bol raha hai ki bhaiya isko tum log knock karo, isko lead bana ke hum bechte hain. Humne jitna lead ko hit kiya hai sab fake tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: 90% lead mera fake tha. Iska matlab hai ki humne kisi aadmi ko bol diya bhai IndiaMART mein search karo, hum usko lead bana ke absorb kar dete hain. Hum jab usko consume kar rahe hain to bol raha hai bhaiya main aise koi hamara koi zarurat hai hi nahi. Theek hai na? Nahi main aisa nahi kehta aisa search kar raha hun. Theek hai na? Baat aisa hai ki hum jab usko consume kar rahe hain kisi ko original requirement hai. Uske baad jab hum usko consume karne ke liye ja raha hun tab aap bol rahe hain ki mera lead khatam ho gaya ab lead buy karo. Mera problem ye hai.
Executive: Aapko jo hai na week ka 17 buylead balance milta hai. Theek hai aap ye keh rahe ho ki aapka [inaudible].
Customer: 17 ke 17 hi fake hai. Ja raha hai.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: 17 ka 17 lead fake, fake lead aap bhej rahe ho. Fake lead kyun bhej rahe ho? Ab mat bhejo. Aapka jitna aa raha hai to main aapka parso rahenge aur Kolkata office mein to aapke aadmi ko bolo uska samne mein main aapko usse baat kara ke dikhata hun. 17 ke 17 lead fake hai.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Jab lead fake le ja raha hai ab aapka aadmi ko bhejo main usko samne hi baat kara ke dikhata hun. Kya bolta hai nahi bolta hai aadmi.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Aapka aapka jo officers hai jo staff hai Kolkata mein, usko bolo main uska samne hi call karta hun. Lead consume karne ke baad. Theek hai wo kya bolta hai agar ho gaya hoga lead consume ho gaya hoga lead by jo buyers hai usko product mil gaya hoga to alag baat hai. Wo to bolega bhaiya mera kaam ho gaya. Dusri baat ye nahi hai ki bhai humne isse koi diya hi nahi hai mera aise koi requirement hai hi nahi. Iska matlab hi to ye hua fake lead.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Fake lead aa raha hai to aapne to kisi aadmi ko rakh rakha hai. Bhai tum ek baar isko is isko search karke isme ek to lead dal do hum usko convert kar deta hun apna jo hai ye hai service provider aur usme uska lead ho gaya. Lekin hum jab original jo kisi ka kaam hota hai to hum jab usko khodne jaate hain tab bolte hain ab buy lead buy karo. Ye to business technique hai. Hum 10 saal row mein nokri kiya hai madam. Hum log ye cheez achcha tarike se jaante hain kya hota hai nahi hota hai.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Main samajhti hun. Hum logo ko sara fake cheez pakadna aata hai madam. Hum log ek meri baat suniye. Se pata laga lete hain.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Aisa thodi hota hai sir. Agar aisa ho raha hota to is ek aisa. Aisa issue hai madam aapko aapko dekho main sara phone aapko suno. Meri baat suno sir. Dekho madam dekho madam ek baat suno ek baat suno madam agar kisi ko humko agar koi cheez chahiye hota theek hai na? Humko humara se pehle humne usko call kiya bhai aapko ye cheez chahiye? Hum bola bhaiya mere ko chahiye tha lekin humko mil chuka hai. Yehi baat na hum bole. To customer kya bol raha hai bhaiya humne lead unka number yehi problem hai dusra koi problem nahi hai aapke sath mein hamara. Humne jab fake lead ko consume kar raha hun jab original lead aa raha hai tab aap business ke liye bol rahe ho aap 3500 mein 10 lead kharido, 18000 mein 20 lead 50 lead kharido, 2 3000 mein 10 lead kharido aapka ye aa raha hai option. Iska matlab kya hai aapko jo paisa liya usme aapko man mein santushti nahi hai. Aap humse aur paisa aithna chahte ho. Fake lead bhej ke lead consume kara deta hun fir bolta aap lead kharido mera se. Aapka business technique yehi hai. Ye mere ko samajh mein aa gaya pura.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Aapka jo business ka technique hai ye mere ko pura samajh mein aa gaya. Aap fake lead bol ke hamara jo free leads hai usko consume kara dete ho. Uske baad fir bolta aap lead kharido.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Aisa nahi hota hai sir har baar.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Aisa hi hai. Bilkul aisa hi hai isko main proof kar dunga. Isko main proof kar dunga.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Isko main proof kar dunga.
Executive: Aap meri baat suniye. Aap solution to cha rahe honge na us cheez se ya nahi cha rahe honge? Aapko jo IndiaMART business deta hai aapne investment. Madam chodiye please. Chodiye please mera jo kiya gaya hai main chodiye main aage baat nahi karna chahta hun. Theek hai na madam chodiye.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving fake buyleads.

- Feels IndiaMART is trying to extract more money.

- Wants to speak with Kolkata office staff.



Resolution:

- Executive stated customer gets 17 buyleads per week.

- Executive was unable to resolve the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will visit Kolkata office to discuss.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fake leads, business technique, refund
